You just imagined every major country except the United States.

We are going to pass Medicare for All and make that a reality in America.

I released a plan today that will fight to open federal databases to Indian Country. We must get to the bottom of the staggering number of missing, murdered, & trafficked Indigenous women.

The United States has signed over 500 treaties with Tribal Nations—and we have broken every single one of them.

Because of our actions, Native American communities lag behind others in terms of health care, education, and economic development. Together, we can right this. https://twitter.com/tperry518/status/1186260709702848513 QT @tperry518 NEW: @KamalaHarris unveiled her Native American platform this AM. She says “Let’s speak truth: we have failed in our obligations to Tribal Nations”

Plan includes
📍500,000 acres of land into trust for Indian tribes
📍Holding annual Tribal Nation Summits
📍Promoting health equity http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EHZx05_WwAAA3A8.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EHZx05_WoAAQU6K.jpg

Native Americans were here first. 

Our nation has failed to fulfill our obligations to Tribal Nations. Today, I released a plan that will honor tribal sovereignty and invest in Native American communities.

RT @Liat_RO 👏MASSIVE  k-12 Ed plan from @ewarren👏
Highlights: increasing Title1 funding & funding for kids with disabilities, school integration, charter school oversight, ending high stakes testing, restorative justice, culturally responsive curricula & WAY MORE. 
https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/public-education?source=SMS

Integrated schools improve educational outcomes for students of all races. And integrated schools are demanded by our Constitution. My administration will fund integration efforts, strengthen Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, and robustly enforce it.

She knows that through our unions we have a voice at work. #AFTvotes https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/public-education

I attended and taught at America’s public schools, and I believe in them. That's why I've got a plan to invest in public schools and ensure every kid in America has the same access to a high-quality public education. https://ewar.ren/education
